Keyboard shortcuts

{{$mutePkg := not (equal "pkg.html" templateName)}}
? : This menu
/ : Search site
f : Jump to identifier
g then g : Go to top of page
g then b : Go to end of page
g then i : Go to index
g then e : Go to examples
